title: Woman in 80s dies after collision near Whitchurch
article: A driver in her 80s has died after a crash involving two vehicles. The collision between the silver Hyundai Getz she was in and a white DAF truck happened on the A41 Grindley Brook road near Whitchurch, Shropshire. The car was at the junction with the B5395 when the crash took place at about 12:30 BST on Tuesday.The woman was taken to hospital with serious head injuries and later died. The coroner has been informed, West Mercia Police said. Read more news for Shropshire
